AI Description: PyGObject is a Python module that enables developers to access GObject-based libraries in Python. It allows Python code to interact with and use functionalities provided by libraries written in the GObject introspection format.
Core Features: Facilitates Interaction Between Python & Gobject-Based Libraries, Enables Python Developers To Utilize Libraries Written In The Gobject Introspection Format, Support For Gobject Properties, Signals, & Interfaces In Python, Provides A High-Level Interface For Working With Gtk & Other Gnome Libraries
